title: Accept me in PBE please
body: I am waiting for 5 months i want to test,plz rito be gud

replies.body: We can't expedite or force applications through, I'm afraid.  As long as your account is in good standing you'll get a fair shot, but more details on how applicants are chosen are also available in our[ PBE Faq](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq).  Best of luck with your application!
Tnx,i am waiting for long like 5 months,anyways thanks
